@TheTrackr please tell me there is a way to prevent your things making my phone ring. Badly design protruding buttons mean they make it ring all the time. If that’s what “Silent mode” should do it’s not working. Massive deal breaker :-(
@MaitreZebre @Vermoot Pense pas que le contrat soit nécessaire pour le National Insurance #. Au fait, tout ça c’est si tu es citoyen EU… et avant mai 2019. Après 🤷🏻‍♂️

@MaitreZebre @mcpaccard @Vermoot Pour le compte en banque ça dépend des banques. Me semble que LLoyds avait accepté juste le passeport sans justificatif de domicile… on avait donné l’adresse d’une copine. Welcome! Hésite pas si t’a d’autres questions.

@MaitreZebre @mcpaccard @Vermoot Rien avant le contrat, national i saura ce number après, mais ça urge pas non plus (c’est pour calculer les impôts retenus à la source, dans l’attente il prennent un taux provisoire et recalcule après.)…

It’s blatant that “GDPR” export tools only scratch the surface of what tech companies really know about you. They track EVERYTHING. I tried the Facebook one and 🙄😶. Likely the law requires “info you told them”, not actions, gps location etc they tracked. https://t.co/k8q8ctN7rJ

Lost in the debate of dongles/cables/ports removed is the consideration of material/ecological waste, likely more important to the decision than financial. If only x% of users need it, including it in the box means 100-x% arę pure waste. At 🍎 scale, even 1% is very significant. https://t.co/RDpXl84Nd4

Not sure if new in #iOS12, but on iPad the button to toggle another input language and the one for the numerical keyboard have switched place. Which finally matches the position on the emoji keyboard, so tapping at the same place will cycle layouts. Still old layout on 📱 https://t.co/ghmpbrpiK2

@andybudd Ie Germany’s attitude to privacy is diametrically opposed to the USA. Of course as always w culture it’s a mix of local evolution w foreign influences.

@andybudd I read it as “maps” being the verb (hence singular). The question was whether digital culture is a single global thing, presumably heavily silicon valley inspired, or whether there are very different local digital culture that evolved from local non digital ones.
@coco_liner No shiny lab… If you need is to film/stream something in a lab maybe consider a laptop, a cheap webcam and a long USB cable?
@francisnorton Wow.
@andybudd Well your tweet said “digital culture maps…” singular. Could have been just a typo...
@andybudd Hum, you are assuming there aren’t diverging local cultures?
